title: Introducing: SNOW CULTURE
body:
Neon Gold signed Swedish duo **Snow Culture** explode on their debut single, _No Sleep_.

Recalling the heady blog-pop days of the early 2010’s, they manage to take all the best elements of that bizarre period (we’re talking the huge synth lines, a booming chorus), and make it sound dangerously current. Check it below.

excerpt.full: Neon Gold signed Swedish duo Snow Culture explode on their debut single, No Sleep. Recalling the heady blog-pop days of the early 2010’s, they manage to take all the best elements of that bizarre period (we’re talking the huge synth lines, a booming chorus), and make it sound dangerously current. Check it below.
